thread.title: 11 Real Wedding Photos From Couples Who Are Just So In Love
thread.title_full: 11 Real Wedding Photos From Couples Who Are Just So In Love

author: Kelsey Borresen
title: 11 Real Wedding Photos From Couples Who Are Just So In Love
text:
11 Real Wedding Photos From Couples Who Are Just So In Love Congratulations, y'all! ðŸ˜Š 
These sweet couples are oh-so in love and we have the photos to prove it. 
Below, see 11 romantic real wedding moments from HuffPost readers who tied the knot over the weekend: 1 Sarah Libby Photography/Instagram "So many surprises, pretty moments, and sweet, thoughtful details throughout Jeff and Alicia's entire wedding day made it pretty spectacular. I met back up with them this morning for the sweetest 'day after' shoot before they headed off on their honeymoon. It was magic." -- Sarah Libby 2 "Love is love!" -- Williamsburg Photo Studios 3 "It was a beautifully rainy Saturday with Jon-Paul and Meg!" -- Angela Zion 4 "These two tied the knot!" -- Monica S. 5 "Brittany and Marty got married in Venice, Florida. Congrats to this sweet couple!" -- Kathleen Atkins 6 "Mark and Michelle Punzelt's wedding at Eagle Mountain Golf." -- Cheryl Clark 7 "There's no missing the powerful connection between Jay and Takara. It's one of those rare photos where they are so consumed in one another that the world has melted away." -- Jerry Willis 8 "Caroline Duncan and Jeremy Gifford of Washington, D.C. said 'I do' on the beach in Vieques, Puerto Rico on Saturday." -- Sandy Malone Weddings 9 "Tiffany and David Caesar married in Orlando, Florida." -- ï»¿ Anesha Collins 10 â€œAmanda and Brendan had a beautiful wedding this weekend at the City Club in Raleigh, North Carolina." -- Hooman Bahrani 11 R Hickman Photography "It's amazing how powerful love is. Before Holly and Jordan's wedding, this area was filled with smoke from the Central Florida fires, and the forecast called for heavy rain. As the wedding time approached, the winds shifted to clear the smoke, and there was no heavy rain, resulting in a night of beautiful heartfelt images." -- Rashad Hickman If you go to a wedding or get married yourself, hashtag your photos #HPrealweddings or e-mail one to us afterward and we may feature it on the site! Please include the coupleâ€™s names as well as the date and location of the wedding. For more real wedding photos, check out the slideshow below: ALSO ON HUFFPOST Real Weddings of the Week 2015 Real Weddings of the Week 2015 1
